sentences: Kõrgeim mägi on ligi 8000 meetrit kõrgus.
context: The Estonian word 'ligi' is an adverb that means almost, nearly, or about when indicating approximation. It's commonly used with time expressions (ligi kaks tundi - almost two hours), measurements (ligi 8000 meetrit - almost 8000 meters), or distances (ligi poole kilomeetri - about half a kilometer).
